Name: Drone VR
About the game: Do you love drones or are you thinking about buying one? Thanks to Drone VR, you will have the opportunity to fly drones in virtual reality - without the fear of smashing this expensive device. My task was to create an application for flying drones and release it at an affordable, low price. 8 drones to play with! The application has the following modes: free flying flying on time (with Steam Leaderboards) More mods will be added soon! Maps: City Factory Farm Park Parking Skatepark Train Depot Warehouse If the application will be popular, new, new modes will be added - go ahead and write what mode you would like to be added on the community page. The application is not a simulator - I tried my best to reproduce the physics of drone movement, but it is not so advanced to define the application as a simulator. Also it doesn't have many settings to adjust. PLANS FOR FUTURE UPDATES: Fixes Adding FPV Drone Controller - racing drone physics, with its own leaderboards. Suggested changes & addons. I will be grateful for any feedback, comments and reviews on Steam. Cheers! Damian3k
